QuestData.Title: One Step Forward...
QuestData.Description: With the ejection system working, I think we're ready to test out movement. This tank has an extra special feature: Automatic Evasive Maneuvers!$b$bI want you to check out the servos on the left leg, the right leg and the Automatic Evasive Maneuver system.$b$bThis is easy stuff, so it shouldn't take too long.
